TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit UISearchResultsUpdating_Extensions extends System.Object

summary.para: Extension methods to the interface to support all the methods from the protocol.

remarks.para: The extension methods for allow developers to treat instances of the interface as having all the optional methods of the original protocol. Since the interface only contains the required members, these extension methods allow developers to call the optional members of the protocol.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void UpdateSearchResultsForSearchController (this MonoTouch.UIKit.IUISearchResultsUpdating This, MonoTouch.UIKit.UISearchController searchController);
.method public static hidebysig void UpdateSearchResultsForSearchController(class MonoTouch.UIKit.IUISearchResultsUpdating This, class MonoTouch.UIKit.UISearchController searchController) cil managed

Docs.param: The instance on which this extension method operates on.
Docs.summary: Updates the results when the user makes changes or when the search bar becomes the first responder.
